idea: Eratronics is an Indian technology and engineering services company that provides advanced telecommunication, safety, security and dedicated network solutions. Eratronics was formed with a single-minded purpose of being one of the most reliable and dependable service providers in the field of Telecommunications, video/ CCTV surveillance systems, Advanced Safety and Security Systems and Solutions. It has expertise in integrating multiple complex systems providing voice, video, data and fibre optic communications solutions for its customers in the Oil and Gas, Power and Energy markets.
name: ERATRONICS PRIVATE LIMITED
